mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_STATUS = 'Y' AND COM_CODE= #{comCode}

SELECT A.COMMUNITY_NO , A.CONTENT, A.VIEWS, A.RECOMMEND , A.N_RECOMMEND , A.WRITER_DATE , A.TITLE , A.COM_CODE, A.WRITER , B.CHANGE_NAME ,B.ORIGIN_NAME FROM COMMUNITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTY_ATTACHMENT B ON (A.COMMUNITY_NO = B.COMMUNITY_NO) WHERE A.COMMUNITY_STATUS='Y' AND A.COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY A.COMMUNITY_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_STATUS ='Y' AND COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY RECOMMEND DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=3

SELECT A.COMMUNITY_NO , A.CONTENT, A.VIEWS, A.RECOMMEND , A.N_RECOMMEND , A.WRITER_DATE , A.TITLE , A.COM_CODE, A.WRITER , B.CHANGE_NAME ,B.ORIGIN_NAME FROM COMMUNITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTY_ATTACHMENT B ON (A.COMMUNITY_NO = B.COMMUNITY_NO) WHERE A.COMMUNITY_STATUS='Y' AND A.WRITER = #{writer} AND A.COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY A.COMMUNITY_NO DESC

SELECT A.COMMUNITY_NO , A.CONTENT, A.VIEWS, A.RECOMMEND , A.N_RECOMMEND , A.WRITER_DATE , A.TITLE , A.COM_CODE, A.WRITER , B.CHANGE_NAME ,B.ORIGIN_NAME FROM COMMUNITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTY_ATTACHMENT B ON (A.COMMUNITY_NO = B.COMMUNITY_NO)
AND A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND A.COMMUNITY_STATUS='Y' AND A.COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY A.COMMUNITY_NO DESC
